name: First Errand
description:
Zhēn Zhēn is almost two years old and will soon leave his mother's nest. Before he starts living on his own, his mother sends him on his first errands so that he can learn the necessary survival skills.

Controls:

  • Up --  W / Up Arrow
  • Left -- A / Left Arrow
  • Down -- S / Down Arrow
  • Right -- D / Right Arrow
  • Jump -- Space Bar

Special Actions:

  • To fall off current platform to reach the ground -- Hold S/Down 
  • After using the the previous special action, press W/Up to return to the normal state.

Story, art and script: Hamizah Ismail

Music: Forget by Lesfm

Fonts:

  • Sketch Logs by Character
  • ARBEI BERRY by wepfont

Created as an entry for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.
